examples.example: 当别人遇到困难时，我们应该主动伸出援手去帮助他们。

translate.english: When others encounter difficulties, we should take the initiative to extend a helping hand to assist them.

examples.example: 在生活中，我们要尽自己所能去帮助那些需要帮助的人。

translate.english: In life, we should do our best to help those who need help.

examples.example: 每当看到他人有困难，我都会毫不犹豫地提供帮助。

translate.english: Whenever I see others in difficulties, I will provide help without hesitation.
